mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile navigation by optimizing the layout for smaller screens and making buttons and links more touch-friendly.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and reduce large file sizes to improve loading times.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more relevant keywords to the page's meta tags, headers, and image alt texts to improve search engine ranking.
userExperienceTip: Enhance the visual appeal and interactivity of the site by updating the design and ensuring consistency across pages.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps and adding clearer call-to-action buttons.
tips: Consider adding more content on the homepage to improve engagement.
Update the website design to make it more modern and user-friendly.
